Subclasses of AndroidRuntimeException in android.content
 class ReceiverCallNotAllowedException
          This exception is thrown from Context.registerReceiver(android.content.BroadcastReceiver, android.content.IntentFilter) and Context.bindService(android.content.Intent, android.content.ServiceConnection, int) when these methods are being used from an BroadcastReceiver component.
